thread.section_title: DPDgroup Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DPDgroup | www.dpd.com | 11 of 107
thread.title: Kim Torr

author: Kim Torr
title: Kim Torr
text:
DPD, What a great company, The technology they use alerts you to where your parcel is right up to the one hour delivery slot in which it will be delivered, also detailing the drivers name, and where they are on that days route.
Well impressed didnt have to wait in all day as my one hour time slot was 10.15 - 11.15 am
So thankful for such a great delivery service
Kim
Bristol
